clearText.description:
Override the default text for the *clear* icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

closeText.description:
Override the default text for the *close popup* icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

disablePortal.description: If `true`, the `Popper` content will be under the DOM hierarchy of the parent component.

forcePopupIcon.description: Force the visibility display of the popup icon.

fullWidth.description: If `true`, the input will take up the full width of its container.

loading.description: If `true`, the component is in a loading state.

limitTags.description: The maximum number of tags that will be visible when not focused. Set `-1` to disable the limit.

openText.description:
Override the default text for the *open popup* icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).
